DOC.brief_summary: This single-group , prospective , intervention study . A total 30 participant unilateral symptomatic femoroacetabular impingement include study . The intervention consist neuromuscular train low limb muscle ( 12 week , 2 times/week supervise training , 2 times/week home training ) . The training include physical exercise routinely use worldwide clinical setting . No control intervention group include study nowadays standard conservative treatment patient symptomatic femoroacetabular impingement . Assessments perform ( 1 ) baseline , ( 2 ) mid-intervention , ( 3 ) end-intervention , ( 4 ) follow-up . Clinical , functional , neuromuscular self-reported parameter collect assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Conservative Treatment Patients With Symptomatic Femoroacetabular Impingement
